item.title: By: How to generate a generation.
item.dc:creator: How to generate a generation.
item.description: [...] and gain the social force needed to replace it. The result is that neoliberalism staggers on, zombie like, ideologically dead, shorn of its teleology and purpose, containing no hope of a better future, yet [...]
